title: Mickey 17
description: Directed by Bong Joon Ho, this film stars Robert Pattinson as an 'Expendable'—a disposable worker who is cloned each time he dies—on a space colony in the year 2054.

title: The Electric State
description: In this Netflix film directed by the Russo brothers, a teenage girl (Millie Bobby Brown) traverses a post-apocalyptic America with a mysterious robot to find her missing brother.

title: Snow White
description: Disney's live-action adaptation of the classic tale, starring Rachel Zegler as Snow White and Gal Gadot as the Evil Queen, reimagines the story with new songs and a modern twist.

title: Plankton: The Movie
description: This Netflix animated film centers on Plankton from 'SpongeBob SquarePants' as his plans for world domination are upended when his computer wife, Karen, takes charge.

title: The Amateur
description: Rami Malek stars in this spy thriller as a CIA cryptographer who seeks revenge after his wife is killed in a terrorist attack, leading him into a dangerous mission.

title: Sinners
description: Directed by Ryan Coogler, this horror film set in 1930s Mississippi blends vampire lore with themes of racial tension and musical heritage.

title: Now You See Me: Now You Don't
description: The third installment in the 'Now You See Me' franchise reunites the Four Horsemen as they team up with new magicians to pull off a heist involving a priceless jewel.

title: Rule Breakers
description: This film tells the inspiring story of a visionary woman who sparks a movement that could transform her nation forever.

title: Oppenheimer
description: Directed by Christopher Nolan, this biographical film chronicles the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in developing the atomic bomb during World War II.

title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
description: An animated adventure featuring Mario and Luigi as they navigate the Mushroom Kingdom to thwart Bowser's plans and rescue Princess Peach.

title: Anora
description: Directed by Sean Baker, this film follows a stripper from New York who marries the wealthy son of a Russian oligarch, exploring themes of love and identity.

title: The Creator
description: Set in 2070, this film follows a former special forces agent tasked with hunting down the 'Creator,' who has developed a weapon that could end the war between humans and AI.

title: Inside Out 2
description: The sequel to Pixar's 'Inside Out' continues to explore the emotional life of Riley as she navigates new challenges and experiences.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
description: In this Marvel crossover, Deadpool teams up with Wolverine for a new adventure filled with action and irreverent humor.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: The continuation of Denis Villeneuve's adaptation of Frank Herbert's novel, following Paul Atreides as he unites with the Fremen to avenge his family.

title: The Wild Robot
description: An animated film about a robot named Roz who becomes stranded on an island and learns to survive and connect with the local wildlife.
